long_description: For times when you only want to carry the bare minimum, the Keen Hazel Canvas Wristlet keeps your phone, cash, credit cards and keys close at hand without the bulk of a backpack or purse. Internal organizer stows cash and credit cards; entire purse zips closed to keep phone and other contents contained. External flat pocket on back has a snap-tab closure. Use either the wrist strap or the removable shoulder strap for a hands-free carrying option. Keen Hazel Wristlet exterior is made of soft linen/cotton with a ticking-stripe lining.
short_description: For times when you only want to carry the bare minimum, the Keen Hazel Canvas Wristlet keeps your phone, cash, credit cards and keys close at hand without the bulk of a backpack or purse.
